sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './ProfileCard.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ProfileCard = ({location}) => { const {user}=useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData); const posts = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.posts) || []; const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER console.log("Posts from Redux:", posts); console.log( "Filtered Posts for User:", posts.filter((post) => post.userId === user._id) ); return ( <>
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt? user.worksAt: "Write about yourself"}
{user.following.length} Following
{user.followers.length} Followers
{location==="ProfilePage" && ( <>
{posts.filter((post) => post.userId === user._id).length} Posts
) }
{ location==="ProfilePage" ? ("" ): (My Profile )}
) } export default ProfileCard
